author: Sydney Morning Herald
title: Ground News - Man charged with breaking into churches, temples, and mosques
text:
Summary by Sydney Morning Herald A man has been charged with 84 offences after allegedly breaking into churches, temples, and mosques throughout south-east Queensland. Share menu More

1 hour ago · Sydney, Australia Read Full Article 9News Lean Right High Factuality Man charged with breaking into churches, temples, and mosques A 44-year-old man has been charged with 84 offences in relation to a series of break and enter offences at churches, temples, and mosques throughout south-east Queensland.The offences were allegedly committed at 23 places of worship between July and December this year.It will be alleged the man targeted cash donations from the community congregations.READ MORE: Sydney hotel evacuated after guest allegedly smashes window and floods entire floor﻿H…
